name: Rise of the Necropolis
description:
You are the blessed knight Louen de Galand, the leader of a party of zealous and skilled fighters in the Kingdom of Carentan. You have been called into service by your king to help defend the realm against the evil necromancer Osiris, who has risen a horde of undead Egyptian-esque Necropolis soldiers from the long forgotten nation of Abydos.

Rise of the Necropolis has multiple ways to both beat or fail the game, and there are countless directions the player can take when playing and exploring the game.
